DOC.brief_title: Feeding America Intervention Trial Health -- Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.detailed_description: For adult diabetes mellitus , diabetes self-management education ( DSME ) critical achieve long-term control blood sugar level ( glycemic control ) prevent diabetes-associated complication . This education often difficult access highly vulnerable marginalize adult United States . Furthermore , food diabetic diet often reach food insecure household . The purpose study determine extent food bank food pantry help reach population effective DSME , food , access primary health care . The investigator ' primary outcome interest HbA1c improvement intervention group compare wait-listed control group food pantry client live uncontrolled type 2 diabetes .
